title: I sorted the League of Legends heroes by prettiest hands... Thoughts?

embed.description: Sheet1 SS, Ahri, Evelynn, Ezreal, Janna, Miss Fortune, Sona, Twisted Fate S, Ashe, Azir, Elise, Fiora, Jhin, Kayn, LeBlanc, Lux, Nami, Shaco, Soraka, Syndra, Varus, Vladimir, Zed A, Akali, Caitlyn, Diana, Kalista, Lissandra, Malzahar, Orianna, Pantheon, Rakan, Shyvana, Talon, Taric, Thresh, X...

body: Hmu on twitter for more quality shitposting about League of Legends hands @ezrealshands

Back when I was a kid...

You know Leonardo Da Vinci's Mona Lisa, right...?

I saw it in an art book.

When I saw Mona Lisa's Hands, folded by her knee...

How do i say this...?

It's a bit crude, but...

Hehe...

I got... a BONER.
